website_summaries.verdict: Heats charcoal fast with 550 watts of power in a small but effective device.
pros: Small enough to fit nicely inside a charcoal chimney
Will have small amounts of charcoal burning more quickly than some other options
Heat-safe handle is larger than some others
cons: Heating element is a little small, so it works better with small amounts of charcoal

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quick! Surprised by how good it is.
customer_reviews.text: First time user of electric starters and I’m impressed! Coals were ashy and ready to go within about 10 minutes. Makes switching to charcoal smoking/grilling easy.
customer_reviews.author: TDo

customer_reviews.title: Easy.  Quick.  Effective.
customer_reviews.text: I admit that when I first saw Home Alone, I had no idea what that hot thing that Kevin hung on the doorknob was. Now I know. Since I loathe the aftertaste of charcoal lighter fluid, I decided to give it a try. Wow, what a nifty way to start a grill! Easy, quick, and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Pete T.

customer_reviews.title: These are dangerous but awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one; I left the first unattended too long and the handle melted... I subsequently got electrecuted a couple times and had to throw that one away. If you want to be able to start your fire straight in your grill, this is the way to go. Chimneys will drop hot embers everywhere. Lighter fluid ruins the taste of everything. Just drop this in and add charcoal (ahem, wood), plug in, wait 10 minutes, then remove the iron. Perfect fire every time.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and gets the coals ready much faster with no horrible taste than lighter fluid.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had purchased years ago. We used to have a charcoal grill but it was a pain trying to get the charcoal ready. Gave up got a gas grill. I missed the taste. I wouldn’t go back because hubby used to drown the coals in lighter fluid and that is all you could taste. Then I remember we had one when I was a kid. Didn’t know how quickly the coals would heat. It’s amazing and no disgusting lighter fluid taste
customer_reviews.author: Claudia C

customer_reviews.title: Best way to start a grill fire
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for all my life because they make starting a fire a snap with no VOC fluids o ruin the flavor of food. They last for many years (usually they go because after maybe 5-7 years they get a bit brittle and dropped or stepped on.). For longest life remove as soon as coals get embers. Keeping it in a burning fire will weaken the filament over time.
customer_reviews.author: Self-Study

customer_reviews.title: A real time saver
customer_reviews.text: For years, I loaded old newspaper or used smelly starters to get charcoal fire going. This device makes that all old history. I pour in charcoal, lay this device on top, cover with a few briquettes and plug it in. 10 minutes later, I’m ready to pull it out and let the remaining charcoal light up. Fast, clean and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ganem III

customer_reviews.title: This product is good but will not last me for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: This is third time buying the product. I use it often since we like to grill and BBQ on my Green Egg. The product is great but if you do not watch it it will break down easily. The first one died because it was left in the rain and it continued to short and bring down my outlet. The second one the handle melted. I suggest placing this in paper bag after every use and storing it in the garage not outside for long use.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Slow to burn the coals and possible burn and fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use... But it takes way too long for the lump charcoal to get going.... if ya have 30 mins to kill while the smoker or grill gets going then it's good. Gotta be super careful when taking it out and letting it cool. Be aware of what your putting it on, it can be a fire hazard, are there kids or pets that can touch it? They can get burned very easily... It does cool rather quickly but still a fire(depending on the surface)and burn hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Jscata

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and I use it for my fire pit too!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my vision grill and I also use it to light my fire pit wood. I've found if I stick it between two logs, plug it in until they start smoking, and then pop them with a lighter they ignite into flames immediately and away we go!
customer_reviews.author: BikesAreFun

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different brand
customer_reviews.text: Only worked once. We had our old one for years!! I am very disappointed. I reached out to charbroil customer service today. Update: per Amazon it states to reach out to the manufacture with problems. I did that and received this message: Resolution: Thank you for contacting Char-Broil. I apologize for the delayed response. I am sorry to inform you that this is not a Char-Broil product so you will have to take your complaint to Amazon. Have a Wonderful Day. Date Closed: 6/22/2020 3:54:59 PM Product Registration: Not Applicable
customer_reviews.author: A. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, If you want to start your charcoal without using any type of fuel and save some time doing this then this is perfect for you. The downside is that you will need a power outlet and that the power cord is a little short.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much better than lighter fluid
customer_reviews.text: Have had 3 different versions of these and the long oval shape of this one is the best. The round ones suck. Stack up the charcoal, plug it in, wait, good to go and no smelly lighter fluid. You can also do a lot of charcoal by lighting a pile, spread it out and add more on top of the already burning embers. I can fill my large Weber.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Matejka

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Once you have used this gizmo, you will never buy another lighter. Our last one lasted over 10 years. Just buy it in the charcoal and go about your food prep. In no time, the charcoal is glowing and you are good to go. Great product. We have one for the house and one for the camper.
customer_reviews.author: B Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Hot
customer_reviews.text: I used this a few times and it worked great for my Vision Grill. The last time I used it, I heard an electrical sound, looked out side and it was arcing blue and white! It tripped the breaker before I could act. I pulled it out and it had melted a hole in itself. Mine just may have been defective.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it claims to do. However; if you have a bowl shaped grill like we do, it doesn't sit flat down in the grill. The charcoal heater is too long to sit down in the grill. So it sits cockeyed, and heats the charcoal unevenly.
customer_reviews.author: Talynebear

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Reliable, no fluid smell or fireballs, get an extension cord though.
customer_reviews.text: My family has been using these to start the charcoal instead of fluid for decades, as long as you don't have a ton of charcoal to do, it works as fast as fluid, and if you do, just start it early and use those coals to light the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Nick DiGaudio

customer_reviews.title: Great Product; Overpriced on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these charcoal starters. They work quickly with no mess, no stinky lighter fluid. I realized too late that they are readily available in most hardware stores for $12-15 versus the $25 charged by Amazon. Otherwise pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie L.

customer_reviews.title: Works good but..
customer_reviews.text: It heats up the coals really well but the one thing I wish they had done was given a little bit more cord. The cord is really short and you have to be close to an electrical outlet to use it. If it had a more length on the cord it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great, bought a second one after a few years because the first rusted after I left it in the rain a few too many times. Anyways, between all the electric starters out there this is the cheapest one and it works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hill

customer_reviews.title: Never buy charcoal fluid again
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I will never buy charcoal fluid again unless I'm somewhere without electricity. This works great and you don't have to deal with the smell of charcoal fluid. Just plug it in, put your charcoal on and it's ready in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene King

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I hate to write a negative review, but we purchased in April and by last week, second week of June, the starter already has a short and trips the breaker. Only used approximately 5 times and only was plugged in long enough to ignite a few starter coals. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: fire danger, not the charcoal kind
customer_reviews.text: be carefulif you must buy this. It works and is less messy than using a chimney. but i bought in december and wa just going to light smoker and saw it had melted aound the handle as seen in the image. just a warning
customer_reviews.author: fxsales

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: OK, was working great then it burned out. Things happen so the company happily replaced it so all good. But the second one burned in half also after a couple of months. So.....do not waste your money on this cheap thing and stick to fluid to light your coals.
customer_reviews.author: Nutty Guy

customer_reviews.title: SO much easier
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I have been starting fire without this before, it is so much easier to do it with this. It works great. It gets really hot, even gets red and it's perfect for starting charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Electric charcoal starter
customer_reviews.text: Honestly haven't used it but once. We bought those little cubes to speed up the process. But it was reasonable enough to buy for the future when I run out of those cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Robin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great device to get your coals burning without pouring any flammable liquid on them
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to get your coals ignited. You also avoid pouring a lot of lighter fluid on the coals and get your eye brows singed :-). Be careful not to use an extension cord if at all possible.
customer_reviews.author: LMarkS

customer_reviews.title: Electric Charcoal Starter
customer_reviews.text: The only negative side I have with this item is the cord; it's too short. I would not have purchased this item if I'd done my research regarding the length of the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt Gamble Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works fast
customer_reviews.text: Works great. A metal element. The ones I recall as a kid were glass. This will not break. Lights fast. Since buying this I also got a Weber chimney for my Lodge grill and it works even better. Both options are 5 stars and do not use lighter fluid!
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Shorts my electrical system and doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I had a different brand that worked great and my backyard plug charges my vehicle & lawnmower fine. This model shorts my system and won't work. Tried to return on the product website but "model number is inaccurate" Need support to return
customer_reviews.author: James Cryan

customer_reviews.title: Best way to start the charcoal chimney
customer_reviews.text: Way better then news paper or sawdust fire starters. You will be able to start the entire chimney instead of only the bottom and waiting for it to work it’s way up.
customer_reviews.author: Austin G.

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great. Took like 10 min to get the charcoal lit and ready to cook. And best of all, no chemical taste from lighter fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is great bang for the buck. I'm not sure why they are having me rate flavor. I gave it 5 stars but really have no opinion on the matter. This being because I only use it to start my charcoal grill, not cook food.
customer_reviews.author: Dude Man

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive little tool that makes life easier.
customer_reviews.text: One of those little things that is super inexpensive and makes life so much easier. When our old one burned out after many years, we immediately purchased a replacement. Just plug it in, place the wire loop among the charcoal lumps (we use regular charcoal in our Green Egg), and the fire is ready in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: TessaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product quit working the first tine we used it. Thankfully we had no problem getting it replaced in a very timely manner though.
customer_reviews.author: 1Shorty

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: After years of using gas grills, I've gone back to charcoal! Like it best. This charcoal starter works great. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Max's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works good but wears out in a couple months from the heat. We wanted to try this so I bought this one because of the price. I will probably try to find a replacement one that might last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The Char-Broil Electric starter does exactly what it is supposed to do. The starter will last me about a year. It is much cleaner and easier than using wood kindling to start the grill.
customer_reviews.author: jhhack

customer_reviews.title: Great for starting charcoal for the grill
customer_reviews.text: I use this for igniting my charcoals for my Green Egg. It's inexpensive and leaves no lighter odors.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal starter
customer_reviews.text: The Charbroil Charcoal Starter works very well. It heats rapidly and ignites a mound of briquettes in about 20-30 minutes leaving no aftertaste as do petroleum based fire starters.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Easy an fast
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product . No more lighter fluid ! And Also you don’t have to wait long to bbq ! We have used it 4x now and we love it . Just plug it in put charcoal on top or wood and walk away !
customer_reviews.author: Johnny M.

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: These work great, but I keep breaking mine because I don't take them out in time, so, buy a couple or a few,
customer_reviews.author: Angela Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to start charcoal for my mini egg. It is great not using chemicals to start the charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: golflsp

customer_reviews.title: Starts charcoal well but cooling mount attached to unit is junk and melted
customer_reviews.text: Works great for starting charcoal but metal support to rest unit on while cooking is very fragile and melted after 2nd use.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D. Winthrop

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot in a hurry!🔥🔥
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Had the coals burning in about five minutes. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: FN

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for piece with many yearts of use
customer_reviews.text: Works effectively as an alternative to charcoal lighter. Same workmanship as prior tool.
customer_reviews.author: charlie badger

customer_reviews.title: Dependable lighting every time!
customer_reviews.text: After struggling to get the "quick light" briquettes to light up for a couple of years, using this electric lighter is a treat. No longer do we have to wonder when they will be hot enough to cook on. No more embarrassing moments when guests are waiting for the charcoal to get hot enough to cook over. No more taste of lighter fluid mingling with the meat. :)
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Works just like the one we had years ago. We’ve just gone back to charcoal and wanted to avoid chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: rutharriet1

customer_reviews.title: Why don't you already have this?
customer_reviews.text: If you use charcoal bricks, this thing is amazing. Create a pile of bricks around this thing, plug it in, ten minutes later your bricks are ready to go. It's amazing. I've had mine for years but I bought this new one for my dad who was super impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Raychee Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, reliable starter. Short cable though, needs extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: CentralCoastShopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend. He drove all over looking for it, then I looked online and Ta Da! He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have used this type of charcoal starter for years. It's easy to use and has the advantage of not adding a petroleum taste to grilled meats and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill starter, only suggestion would be to make the cord a little bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi Tochiki

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: When I plugged it in it shorted out and almost caught the handle on fire
customer_reviews.author: Ryan King

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor Saver
customer_reviews.text: Works quickly(8 minutes and you are ready to go), and allows you to have original charcoal flavor rather than using newspapers or liquid fuel that may never burn off it’s flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We had to buy a new one of these, after my husband’s previous one broke after 14 years. These things are a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, starts up briquettes faster than regular lighter fluid
customer_reviews.author: Erik M Faria

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Get your grill going naturally with sacrificing taste or health with lighting fluid. I loved it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but short cord
customer_reviews.text: Works great, wish it had a longer cord but otherwise does a great job
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: This is it...
customer_reviews.text: Fluid on my lump coal? No thanks! Lighter fluid is for bond fires!
customer_reviews.author: Darth Vapor

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a couple years
customer_reviews.text: Use this to start my Charcoal grill. Very convenient. The last one worked for around two years then it cracked through the coil. For the amount of use we put these starter's through I think it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chad S.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Heats up pretty fast and does the job. Nothing fancy but functional. It’s lasted all summer so I would recommend this unit as an alternative to the larger more expensive ones. Hot is hot right?
customer_reviews.author: Juarez Cisco Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Good product good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a tool that makes lighting my egg much easier
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D.

customer_reviews.title: red hou!!
customer_reviews.text: Used charcoal starter in smoker to dry pork belly, then to give it a shot of heavy smoke.. wow.. worked great
customer_reviews.author: ROCKYLAB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and keeps you from having to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Charcoal is ready within 10 minutes. Easy to use and keeps you from having to use and lighter fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Eating Healthy foods
customer_reviews.text: This product will keep you and Family safe and free from fluid light chemicals in your while grilling & your food taste better just the way it should, you actually taste what you cook and not fluid light. I have been using this product for years but need a ned on my daughter took mine lol.. 🍗🌭🥩🍗😋❤
customer_reviews.author: Claudette Pascal

customer_reviews.title: Failed during first three minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: See photos, the unit split open immediately upon plugging it in. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: E. Milstein

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gadget!!!! No more lighter fluid or coal drenched in the stuff. Lights any coal in 5 minutes! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Burnt!
customer_reviews.text: The curve of it burnt up the 2nd or 3rd time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ramey Hill

customer_reviews.title: OK product
customer_reviews.text: This product is OK but you need an extension cord for it and need to watch closely to make sure that it doesn’t start melting its handle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fires the charcoal up great
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I picked one of these up for my Green Egg. It fires the lump up great and I no longer have to mess with lighting those fire starters.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Arnsmeier

customer_reviews.title: Coil fell apart in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Coil fell apart in 6 months. Is there a better unit on Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: c.holt

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my egg's lump charcoal fire. Highly recommendable!
customer_reviews.author: Tholkien

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: I love the lighter but , I gave it four stars because the cord is supper short. If your barbecuing far away from a outlet, you may have to use an extension cord. Other then that I prefer to use this instead of lighter fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! Will buy again & again!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my 2nd starter. These work great! Lights the charcoal quickly & you don't ruin your meat with lighter fluid. My first one lasted 4 years with 3 or 4 days a week use.
customer_reviews.author: Jane H.

customer_reviews.title: what's important to know
customer_reviews.text: if you cook with charcoal, it's perfect tool heat the coals much quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Leann K.

customer_reviews.title: This is a safe product that lights my grill in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a safe product that lights my grill in minutes using charcoal without the smell and danger of lighting fluid. I will not use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heats up charcoal fast
customer_reviews.text: This beats the smell of lighter fluid that sometimes transfers to food
customer_reviews.author: Alicia j Sidles

customer_reviews.title: Electric charcoal stater for thos who do not what to use lighter fluid
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for non chemical starter this is the one all electric no fumes no taste no orders
customer_reviews.author: John C. Rodda

customer_reviews.title: so much better than lighter fluid
customer_reviews.text: Who wants to eat food cooked with lighter fluid, yuk!!!! This starter works great.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Zuraw

customer_reviews.title: Buying another
customer_reviews.text: Great use it all the time even use it to smoke cheese in a barrel I use it camping with my generator
customer_reviews.author: Robert Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Works better than lighter fluid!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The cord is short so you will need an extension cord but it lights pretty much instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Tangerine Munro

customer_reviews.title: FORGET ABOUT THE CHARCOAL CHIMNEY  USE THI INSTEAD
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Heats very fast. I am an avid bbq fanatic and this thing works very well .
customer_reviews.author: M. Talan

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have used on lump coal, and works absolutely perfectly and quickly. I use it directly in the grill. Add a few coals to the bottom and a few to the top, it's simple and a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: LouE777

customer_reviews.title: Good item to have!👍👍👍👍👍😁🤙
customer_reviews.text: I used to have one of these before. It keeps me from putting coals on the stove to light.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon N.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Starts a bbq right away....no chemicals and no artificial starters. Love it! Cord is alittle short but we use it with an extension cord no problem.
customer_reviews.author: ASilva

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, used it for Memorial Day to start my green egg!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So convenient! Will quickly pay for itself in charcoal lighting fluid!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, fires up coals in 5-6 mins, I fan to increase productivity.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what what it says it does.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that has helped me start the grill!! Almost gave up on a charcoal grill, WAY to much work, this fixed all that. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Andrade

customer_reviews.title: No lighter fluid needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good price and works great! I love being able to start charcoal with fluid and matches! No fluid flavor on your food!
customer_reviews.author: SJWC

customer_reviews.title: Slow to heat up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but takes a while to heat up and start the charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: DAnne Terrill

customer_reviews.title: The cord was EXTREMELY short and had to use an extension cord
customer_reviews.text: The cord was EXTREMELY short and had to use an extension cord
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No chemical fire starting
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple fire starter. No chemicals, works every time and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jens Buckler

customer_reviews.title: Short Cord
customer_reviews.text: Great price, solid product. Just beware, the cord is super short. You have to have an extension cord to use this in any standard waist high BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: Dlapham

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal starter
customer_reviews.text: Works great, wish the cord was longer. About 8 feet would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J.

customer_reviews.title: Great, for two months...now blown.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as it should, but only lasted two months. I was able to use it about 6-8 times and now it's blown.
customer_reviews.author: jesse speeks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than expected. No more worries. A lot more bbq's
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome starter.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool. Makes starting charcoal a breeze with no lighter fluid smell. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone that uses charcoal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for boyfriend. Makes it a lot easier to get the charcoal going!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Beware adding it directly in your kamado ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Beware adding it directly in your kamado style grill and shutting the lid to wait for it to catch, the cord is susceptible to heat damage (this is my second one 😉).
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK R KELLY

product_meta.title: Char-Broil Electric Charcoal Starter
product_meta.description: Grill safely & cleanly, without that lighter-fluid taste, using the electric charcoal starter from Char-Broil. Powered by a 120V, 550W electric heat element, the tool ignites charcoal without matches or lighter fluid. A sturdy heat-resistant handle stays cool to the touch.
feature_bullets: Generates 550 watts at 120 volts for lighting briquette piles
Measures 17.5" L x 4.5" w x 2" D

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars611 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
